original: KULLIN, Sven August, Kamrer, Stockholm, f Tengene, Skarab l, 10/1 96 av byggm J K o Maria Bladh, gm Märta Anderson. Filip Holmqvists hdlsinst. Anst h bruksäg G Öhman Sörvik 13—15, Gbgs elverk 16, Västml lantm centralfrn V.ås o Köping 18—20, Fell-din, Fahlström & Co AB Sthlm 20—23, Carl Folke & Co AB Sthlm sed. 24. Frimurare, AuroraO mfl. KULLIN G, Ernst Rickard, Direktör, Stockholm, f Lindärva, Skarab l, 19/6 05 av kyrkoh L K o Clara Wallgren, gm Britta Björk. Studex Skara 23, jur kand 31. Anst adv.kont Sthlm 26, sekr Sv bag.idk.frn, Frn Sv spisbr.-fabr, Sthlm bag.idk.frn, red.sekr Sv Bag.tidskr 26—28, medarb NDA 29—32, omb.m Sv boktryck.frn, Sv litogr tryck.äg frb o Sv trycker arb.giv.frb 32—35, dessa org:s vkst dir sed. 35, omb.m Sv tapetfabr frn 34—40, styr.ordf där 40—41, omb.m Sv bokbind.idk arb.giv.frb 36—38, dess vkst dir sed. 38, sekr Nord boktryckarråd 32, led av detta sed. 35, red.sekr Sv Boktryck.frns Medd 32, red o ansv utg 33—34, d:o tidskr Graf Forum sed. 35, sekr Sv boktryck.frns sjuk- o begravn.-hj.kassa sed. 32, vkst dir Sv klichéanst.frn sed. 38, d:o Sv graf ind.frb sed. 41, flmsuppl o stämmoomb Sv arb.giv.frn sed. 34, styr.-suppl Boktr.frns fastigh.AB sed. 32, suppl Yrkesfrb rens repr.skåp inom Sv hantv.org sed. 39, led Arb.markn.org :as yrkesutb.komm sed. 40, Stat inform.styr :s reklamråd 40, styr f Stift graf forskn.lab sed. 42, flm Sv ind.frb sed. 42, led dess pat.komm o komm f underv-o yrkesutb.fråg sed. 42. Graf ind:ens tryck-färgsråd sed. 42, styr.led o kassabev Skara-djäkn frn sed. 38, förest f Sv boktryck.frns mästark 36 o Nord boktr.rådets k f boktr o f akt 39, led komm f fir av Gutenbergsjub 41 o f utställn Det tryckta ordet 500 år, Sthlm, Gbg, Malmö o Halmst, 41—42, ordf dess arb.-utsk. Resor: Danm 32—39 uppr ggr, Norge 32, 38, Tyskl 33, 37, 38, Engl 35, 36, Belg 35, Finl 35, 38, Österr 37. Av trycket: Omsättn.-sk o de graf yrkena 11, Sv boktryck.frn 50 år 1943 (tills m S Bring), upps rör tryckfrih.-rättsl mfl jurid frågor. Skyt.m s, milit idr.m s. Hobby: Fiske.
translated:
KULLIN, Sven August, Accountant, Stockholm, born in Tengene, Skaraborg county, 10/1 1896 to construction worker J K and Maria Bladh, married to Märta Anderson. Formerly employed at G. Öhman Sörvik 13-15, Goteborg Electric Company 16, Västmanland Agriculture and Land Mapping Authority in Västerås and Köping 18-20, Fell-din, Fahlström & Co AB Stockholm 20-23, Carl Folke & Co AB Stockholm since 24. Freemason, member of AuroraO etc. 
KULLIN G, Ernst Rickard, Director, Stockholm, born in Lindärva, Skaraborg county, 19/6 1905 to church minister L K and Clara Wallgren, married to Britta Björk. Studied at Skara 23, graduated in law 31. Employed at law firm in Stockholm 26, secretary of the Swedish Bag Manufacturers' Association, Swedish Stove Manufacturers' Association, and Swedish Paper and Printing Employers' Association 26-35, editor of NDA 29-32, delegate of the Swedish Book Printers' Association, the Swedish Lithographic Printing Owners' Association, and the Swedish Printing Employers' Association 32-35, director of these organizations since 35, delegate of the Swedish Wallpaper Manufacturers' Association 34-40, chairman of the board 40-41, delegate of the Swedish Bookbinding Employers' Association 36-38, director since 38, secretary of the Nordic Printers' Council 32, member since 35, editor of the Swedish Book Printers' Association's Bulletin 32, editor and responsible publisher 33-34, also editor of the magazine Graf Forum since 35, secretary of the Swedish Book Printers' Association's Sick and Funeral Services Fund since 32, director of the Swedish cliché printing company since 38, also the Swedish Graphic Industry Association since 41, film delegate and assembly representative of the Swedish Employers' Association since 34, board member of the Book Printers' Real Estate Company since 32, member of the Professional Association of Clothes Cleaning Representatives within the Swedish Handicraft Organization since 39, member of the Labor Market Organization's vocational education committee since 40, State Information Board's advertising council 40, board member of the Foundation for Graphic Research Laboratory since 42, film delegate of the Swedish Industry Association since 42, member of its patent committee and committee for education and vocational training since 42, print industry's color printing council since 42, board member and treasurer of the Skara Cathedral Red Club since 38, superintendent of the Swedish Book Printers' Association's Masterpiece 36 and the Nordic Printers' Council's celebration committee for the Gutenberg Jubilee and the exhibition The Printed Word 500 Years, Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, and Halmstad 41-42, chairman of its work committee. Travels: Denmark 32-39 on various occasions, Norway 32, 38, Germany 33, 37, 38, England 35, 36, Belgium 35, Finland 35, 38, Austria 37. Publications: The turnover tax and the graphic trades 11, The Swedish Book Printers' Association 50 Years 1943 (co-authored with S. Bring), essays on freedom of the press and legal matters. Military service, hobbies: Fishing.
